description: Rare is the time I need to launch a browser to check out the lyrics of any song in my music library! Now that is handy! I miss it every time I am away from my Ubuntu Gnome machine serving as my shop/Recreation room computer. I keep intending to see if it is adaptable to my home machine, even though it is sporting KDE. The developer(s) should be proud of this one because I am!
summary: This is so very nice to have! Highly recommended!
